none: Victor Eremita - A Study For Transendental Communication
Victor Eremita - A Study For Transendental Communication

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 24, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
Murky, cold and detached minimal electronics...like alien industrial sounds in slow motion, or living through a catastrophe while trapped helpless under water. Four tracks (or "Aktions") spanning one half of your precious hours. Respect to Black Horizons for never disappointing. A STUDY FOR TRANSCENDENTAL COMMUNICATION
